title: The Love Nest / DVD / x264 / MKV / 698x576 / Masters of Cinema (2008)

sources.title: The Love Nest / DVD / x264 / MKV / 698x576 / Masters of Cinema (2008)
sources.description: Buster bids goodbye to Virginia and all women, sailing away in his "Cupid." Later, without food or water, he is taken on board "The Love Nest" which has a very mean captain. A crewman who spills coffee on the captain's hand is thrown overboard. So is anyone else who bothers the captain.
